title: Bought - The Price of Pain
description: Life isn’t always fair. Matilda Ryan has gone through a divorce, lost her job and to top it all, now she has money problems. What will fate throw at her next, she wonders. The answer is the sexy Ethan Chase with his bad attitude, money and irresistible offer. But can she accept it – can she do as he wants and become his sexual plaything just pay her debts? It might be okay if Chase wasn’t a Dominant, and what he was offering wasn’t all about pain.
author: Lacey King
